description:
Momose Narumi is a http://anidb.net/t2268 [fujoshi] http://anidb.net/t1133 [otaku], who also likes otome games, and idols. She blames being an otaku for difficulties in her life and attempts to keep it a secret, especially at work. She is childhood friends with http://anidb.net/ch90532 [Hirotaka] and is dating him.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Momose Narumi
